full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 219 of 228 895 LC2Qmax7 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 BY MS. COMEY: 2 Q. I want to break that down. Were there two different kinds of massagers? 3 A. Yes. 4 Q. What did the first one look like? 5 A. The first one looked like a pillow, the form of a pillow, and the other one looked like an arm with -- at the end of the arm, there was this rubber vibrator ball. 6 Q. So the second one with the ball at the end of the long arm, did it vibrate? 7 A. Yes. 8 Q. About how often do you remember finding these massagers in Mr. Epstein's room after one of Mr. Epstein's massages? 9 A. Not too often. 10 Q. About how many times? 11 A. Probably three, four times. 12 Q. What did you do with the massagers after you found them? 13 A. Those massagers were kept at the top of his dresser with the rest of the oils and fragrances for the massage. 14 Q. At the top of whose dresser? 15 A. Mr. Epstein's dresser. 16 Q. In whose room? 17 A. Mr. Epstein's bathroom. 18 Q. Attached to the master bedroom? 19 A. Yes, Mr. Epstein's bathroom. 20 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012504
